content.html: Yeah, all of capitalism is bad, but not all equally bad. Saying so gives cover to bad actors. Take a look at the reasons given why different companies are bad. Conspiracy theories & "Javascript bad" are not the same as worker exploitation & crypto grifts. twitter.com/wongmjane/stat…
content.value: Yeah, all of capitalism is bad, but not all equally bad. Saying so gives cover to bad actors. Take a look at the reasons given why different companies are bad. Conspiracy theories & "Javascript bad" are not the same as worker exploitation & crypto grifts.
